name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Skilled Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in developing cloud-native applications using **Python 3**, **FastAPI**, and **PostgreSQL** within high-performance environments such as healthcare and finance. Demonstrated proficiency in deploying scalable solutions on **Google Cloud Platform**, leveraging technologies including **Google BigQuery**, **ScyllaDB**, **Redis**, **RabbitMQ**, **Apache Kafka**, and **Google Pub/Sub**.
Expertise in both frontend and backend development, with strong experience in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Flutter**, as well as frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, and **Node.js**. Proven track record in implementing microservices and event-driven architectures, along with robust CI/CD pipelines.
Background in AI/ML integration to support data-driven decision-making, with hands-on experience in MLOps and compliance-driven development aligned with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards.
